ygData.subject: Re: Surviving Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: ROTFLMAO!!!  Ok I don t know jack about Guk but I had to say that was one of the funniest things I have read in a long long time.  Funnier for me I guess since
ygData.messageBody:
ROTFLMAO!!! Ok I don't know jack about Guk but I had to say that was one of
the funniest things I have read in a long long time. Funnier for me I guess
since I am from Mississippi. But please don't hold that against me. =)

Kurik Nitesong
24th bard (with all the pretty lights now)
Veeshan

> (two froglock guards sit in a chair as a bard goes
> running past them at full speed followed by half a
> dungeon, one says to the other in a souther voice)
> "you reckon that er bards dun riled em froggies up?"
> "I reckon"
> "Ma, git my gun"
>
